As you all know...
http://headlines.yahoo.co.jp/hl?a=20041112-00000202-kyodo-ent

Yamazaki Susumu's Record book was discovered a while back....RECORD 
book...not secret *diary* ^_^

again Tama took pity on us and gave a quick summary of *how this 
valuable book was brought to light

A man who's ancestor was a merchant in Osaka brought this. In this 
family, tradition said that Kondo leave some pack to the family when 
they left western region.

And it said a journal was included in that package.
And a brother of that man brought that paper to Hino.

that's all we know right now
